response:
Right-sided spastic hemiparesis with hyperreflexia and extensor plantar response, impaired vibration/proprioception and positive Romberg but intact facial and bulbar function localise to a right hemicord lesion in the high cervical spinal cord; unilateral reduced visual acuity with a left relative afferent pupillary defect localises separately to the left optic nerve.

lesion_locations = ["right high cervical spinal cord", "left optic nerve"]
